definition: flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: I wish grandpa a peaceful life in his late years, and a good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我忠心祝願爺爺安享晚年，洪福齊天。
